MARK 4.6 at sunnin þan urrinnandin ufbrann, jah unte ni habaida waurtins, gaþaursnoda.
MARK 4.7 jah sum gadraus in þaurnuns;
jah ufarstigun þai þaurnjus jah afƕapidedun þata, jah akran ni gaf.
MARK 4.8 jah sum gadraus in airþa goda jah gaf akran urrinnando jah wahsjando, jah bar ain ·l· jah ain ·j· jah ain ·r· MARK 4.9 jah qaþ:
MARK 4.10 iþ biþe warþ sundro, frehun ina þai bi ina miþ þaim twalibim þizos gajukons.

izwis atgiban ist kunnan runa þiudangardjos gudis, iþ jainaim þaim uta in gajukom allata wairþiþ, MARK 4.12 ei saiƕandans saiƕaina jah ni gaumjaina, jah hausjandans hausjaina jah ni fraþjaina, ibai ƕan gawandjaina sik jah afletaindau im frawaurhteis.
ni wituþ þo gajukon, jah ƕaiwa allos þos gajukons kunneiþ?
MARK 4.15 aþþan þai wiþra wig sind, þarei saiada þata waurd, jah þan gahausjand unkarjans, suns qimiþ Satanas jah usnimiþ waurd þata insaiano in hairtam ize.
MARK 4.16 jah þai sind samaleiko þai ana stainahamma saianans, þaiei þan hausjand þata waurd, suns miþ fahedai nimand ita MARK 4.17 jah ni haband waurtins in sis, ak ƕeilaƕairbai sind;
þaþroh, biþe qimiþ aglo aiþþau wrakja in þis waurdis, suns gamarzjanda.
MARK 4.18 jah þai sind þai in þaurnuns saianans, þai waurd hausjandans,
MARK 4.19 jah saurgos þizos libainais jah afmarzeins gabeins jah þai bi þata anþar lustjus innatgaggandans afƕapjand þata waurd, jah akranalaus wairþiþ.
MARK 4.20 jah þai sind þai ana airþai þizai godon saianans, þaiei hausjand þata waurd jah andnimand jah akran bairand, ain ·l· jah ain ·j· jah ain ·r· MARK 4.21 jah qaþ du im:
ibai lukarn qimiþ duþe ei uf melan satjaidau aiþþau undar ligr?
MARK 4.22 nih allis ist ƕa fulginis þatei ni gabairhtjaidau:
nih warþ analaugn, ak ei swikunþ wairþai.
MARK 4.23 jabai ƕas habai ausona hausjandona, gahausjai.
in þizaiei mitaþ mitiþ, mitada izwis jah biaukada izwis þaim galaubjandam.
MARK 4.25 unte þisƕammeh saei habaiþ gibada imma;
jah saei ni habaiþ jah þatei habaiþ afnimada imma.
swa ist þiudangardi gudis, swaswe jabai manna wairpiþ fraiwa ana airþa.
MARK 4.27 jah slepiþ jah urreisiþ naht jah daga, jah þata fraiw keiniþ jah liudiþ swe ni wait is.
MARK 4.28 silbo auk airþa akran bairiþ: frumist gras, þaþroh ahs, þaþroh fulliþ kaurnis in þamma ahsa.
MARK 4.29 þanuh biþe atgibada akran, suns insandeiþ gilþa, unte atist asans.
ƕe galeikom þiudangardja gudis, aiþþau in ƕileikai gajukon gabairam þo?
MARK 4.31 swe kaurno sinapis, þatei þan saiada ana airþa, minnist allaize fraiwe ist þize ana airþai;
MARK 4.32 jah þan saiada, urrinniþ jah wairþiþ allaize grase maist jah gataujiþ astans mikilans, swaswe magun uf skadau is fuglos himinis gabauan.
MARK 4.33 jah swaleikaim managaim gajukom rodida du im þata waurd, swaswe mahtedun hausjon.
MARK 4.34 iþ inuh gajukon ni rodida im, iþ sundro siponjam seinaim andband allata.
MARK 4.35 jah qaþ du im in jainamma daga at andanahtja þan waurþanamma:
MARK 4.36 jah afletandans þo managein andnemun ina swe was in skipa;
jah þan anþara skipa wesun miþ imma.
MARK 4.37 jah warþ skura windis mikila jah wegos waltidedun in skip, swaswe ita juþan gafullnoda.
MARK 4.38 jah was is ana notin ana waggarja slepands, jah urraisidedun ina jah qeþun du imma:
laisari, niu kara þuk þizei fraqistnam?
